meanings.definition: A mark left on the skin from kissing or sucking
meanings.sent1: She had a hickie on her neck from the kiss.
meanings.sent2: He noticed a hickie on his arm after the hug.
meanings.sent3: The hickie on his cheek made him blush.
meanings.sent4: The hickie on her wrist was a colorful reminder of their affection.
meanings.sent5: The hickie on his forehead was impossible to hide.

meanings.definition: A bump or swelling caused by a blow or impact
meanings.sent1: The hickie on his head was from the fall.
meanings.sent2: She got a hickie on her knee after bumping into the table.
meanings.sent3: The hickie on his elbow looked like a small mountain.
meanings.sent4: The hickie on her ankle felt like a tiny balloon.
meanings.sent5: The hickie on his shoulder throbbed with pain.
